summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3147 for the improvement of Twelve Avenue, from East Roy Street to East Prospect Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38414, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
